atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the @tailwind directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities`, and `variants` styles into your CSS.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use @apply to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the @layer directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Use the @config directive to specify which config file Tailwind should use when compiling this CSS file.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use the @theme directive to define custom theme values in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Use the @custom-variant directive to define custom variants in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @source
atDirectives.description: Use the @source directive to specify additional source paths in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @utility
atDirectives.description: Use the @utility directive to define custom utilities in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @variant
atDirectives.description: Use the @variant directive to apply variants in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @plugin
atDirectives.description: Use the @plugin directive to import Tailwind plugins in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @import
atDirectives.description: Use @import to import other CSS files or Tailwind CSS.
